quote: Nothing goes out of fashion sooner than a long dress with a very low neck.
A dress makes no sense unless it inspires men to want to take it off you.
Any affectation whatsoever in dress implies, in my mind, a flaw in the understanding.
Be careless in your dress if you must, but keep a tidy soul.
Be plain in dress, and sober in your diet; In short, my dear, kiss me and be quiet.
Eat to please thyself, but dress to please others.
Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.
Nothing goes out of fashion sooner than a long dress with a very low neck.
A dress makes no sense unless it inspires men to want to take it off you.
Any affectation whatsoever in dress implies, in my mind, a flaw in the understanding.
Be careless in your dress if you must, but keep a tidy soul.
Be plain in dress, and sober in your diet; In short, my dear, kiss me and be quiet.
Eat to please thyself, but dress to please others.
Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.
Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
Gossip is news running ahead of itself in a red satin dress.
I hold that gentleman to be the best-dressed whose dress no one observes.
I only have two rules for my newly born daughter: she will dress well and never have sex.
Infinite hungers leap no more I in the chance swaying of your dress; and love has changed to kindliness.
Language is the dress of thought.
Men naturally resent it when women take greater liberties in dress than men are allowed.
No change in musical style will survive unless it is accompanied by a change in clothing style. Rock is to dress up to.
Philosophy is common-sense in a dress suit.
So dress and conduct yourself so that people who have been in your company will not recall what you had on.
The car has become an article of dress without which we feel uncertain, unclad, and incomplete.
The connection between dress and war is not far to seek; your finest clothes are those you wear as soldiers.
The connection between dress and war is not far to seek; your finest clothes are those you wear as soldiers.
The law is simply expediency wearing a long white dress.
The only medicine that does women more good than harm is dress.
The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
There is no such thing as a moral dress. It's people who are moral or immoral.
They are best dressed, whose dress no one observes.
Those who make their dress a principal part of themselves will, in general, become of no more value than their dress.
